original: @79a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @79a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i gu hya ratna tsindha ma ni n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i gu hya ratna tsindha ma ni n'a ma /
translated: Śrī-guhya-ratna-cintāmaṇi-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal gsang ba rin po che yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal gsang ba rin po che yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba /
translated: The glorious secret wish-fulfilling jewel of the precious one, called the Wish-Fulfilling Jewel

original: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽mkha' mnyam sprin phung 'dza' tshon 'brug sgra sgrogs //
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo // mkha' mnyam sprin phung 'dza' tshon 'brug sgra sgrogs //
translated: Homage to the glorious Cakrasaṃvara.🔽Clouds equal to space, with the sound of thunder,

original: mtshungs dang / rgyun drab char rgyun glog 'gyu ba //
analyzed: mtshungs dang / rgyun drab char rgyun glog 'gyu ba //
translated: With rain, lightning, and wind,

original: rgya mtsho las ni yid bzhin nor bu 'o ma'i mtsho //
analyzed: rgya mtsho las ni yid bzhin nor bu 'o ma'i mtsho //
translated: The wish-fulfilling jewel from the ocean, the milk ocean,

original: 'khor los bsrub dang bsrubs pa'i sbyor bas gnas 'dir rgyas //🔽rdo rje sku la des gnas pa'i //
analyzed: 'khor los bsrub dang bsrubs pa'i sbyor bas gnas 'dir rgyas // rdo rje sku la des gnas pa'i //
translated: Grows in this place through the practice of churning with the cakra.

original: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog gyur pa //
translated: The maṇḍala cakra, supreme,

original: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu brgyan //
analyzed: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu brgyan //
translated: Always adorned with the nature of all,

original: rang byung 'di ni he ru ka'o //
analyzed: rang byung 'di ni he ru ka'o //
translated: This self-arisen one is Heruka.

original: dang por re zhig skye bos bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa las dkyil 'khor du dbang dang dam tshig thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas sems can mngon du byas te /
analyzed: dang por re zhig skye bos bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa las dkyil 'khor du dbang dang dam tshig thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas sems can mngon du byas te /
translated: First, a practitioner who has obtained empowerment and samaya in the maṇḍala from the stage of the guru lineage, having manifested sentient beings,

original: byang chub kyi sems chad du med pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems chad du med pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the uninterrupted bodhicitta.

original: h'um yig nag po las 'od zer gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phros pas rdo rje'i tshogs su gyur pa dang / de dag las 'od 'phros khro bo'i tshogs dpag tu med par gyur nas /
analyzed: h'um yig nag po las 'od zer gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa 'phros pas rdo rje'i tshogs su gyur pa dang / de dag las 'od 'phros khro bo'i tshogs dpag tu med par gyur nas /
translated: An immeasurable mass of light rays emanate from the black syllable hūṃ, becoming a mass of vajras, and from those light rays, an immeasurable host of wrathful ones emanate,

original: lugs dang lugs las bzlog pa'i sngags 'di brjod de /
analyzed: lugs dang lugs las bzlog pa'i sngags 'di brjod de /
translated: and one should recite this mantra in forward and reverse order:

original: aom hr'i: gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
analyzed: aom hr'i: gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
translated: oṃ hṛīḥ gha gha ghaṭaya ghaṭaya

original: sarba du sht'an h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa las /
analyzed: sarba du sht'an h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa las /
translated: sarva duṣṭān hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: rdo rje dang me 'od 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis phyogs thams cad du khyab par gyur par blta'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang me 'od 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis phyogs thams cad du khyab par gyur par blta'o //
translated: One should visualize that the vajras and the mass of blazing fire pervade everywhere in all directions.

original: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis bla ma dang dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i tshogs nam mkhar bltas la /
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis bla ma dang dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i tshogs nam mkhar bltas la /
translated: Then, one should visualize the assembly of the maṇḍala wheel in the sky with the light of the seed syllable in one’s heart,

original: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas la bzod par gsol te /
analyzed: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas la bzod par gsol te /
translated: confess one’s vile actions, and so on, and request forbearance.

original: 'di la mi snang bar gyur nas phyi nang bdag dang bcas pa thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par blta'o //🔽de'i ngang las rten dang brten pa mnyam par rang bzhin gyis grub pa /
analyzed: 'di la mi snang bar gyur nas phyi nang bdag dang bcas pa thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par blta'o // de'i ngang las rten dang brten pa mnyam par rang bzhin gyis grub pa /
translated: Having disappeared into this, one should view all of the external and internal, including the self, as empty of inherent existence.🔽From within that state, the supporting and supported mandalas arise as naturally present,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dur khrod dang bcas par byung ba ste /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dur khrod dang bcas par byung ba ste /
translated: together with the charnel grounds.

original: mkha' mnyam stong ba las byung zhing //
analyzed: mkha' mnyam stong ba las byung zhing //
translated: Arisen from the emptiness equal to space,

original: nam mkha'i mkha' la longs spyod cing //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mkha' la longs spyod cing //
translated: enjoying the space of the sky,

original: he ru ka dpal dkyil 'khor mchog / bha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal dkyil 'khor mchog / bha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the supreme mandala of glorious Heruka in the center of the bhaga.

original: sna tshogs padma mi shigs pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma mi shigs pa //
translated: The indestructible variegated lotus

original: ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul las //
analyzed: ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul las //
translated: is the secret field of activity of the pistils.

original: a'a li k'a li sbyor dbus h'um //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li sbyor dbus h'um //
translated: In the center of the union of ālikāli is hūṃ,

original: 'od zer 'phros pa yongs gyur pas //
analyzed: 'od zer 'phros pa yongs gyur pas //
translated: which completely transforms into light rays radiating out

original: shr'i he ru ka khrag 'thung @79b dpal //
analyzed: shr'i he ru ka khrag 'thung @79b dpal //
translated: and then back in, becoming the glorious heruka Śrī Heruka.

original: skad cig gis ni sku rdzogs pa //
analyzed: skad cig gis ni sku rdzogs pa //
translated: In an instant, his body is complete,

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa //
translated: with one face, two arms, and three eyes,

original: dus mtshan dang ni 'jigs byed dag / g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis gnon mdzad pa //
analyzed: dus mtshan dang ni 'jigs byed dag / g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis gnon mdzad pa //
translated: standing with his right leg straight on the corpse of Bhairava and his left leg bent on the corpse of Kālarātri.

original: bee d'ur nam mkha'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: bee d'ur nam mkha'i rang bzhin can //
translated: The nature of the sky, the nature of Vaidurya,🔽The supreme of the great Vajra holders,

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen bo'i mchog / sna tshogs rdo rje phyag rgya drug / zla phyed mgo phreng dag gis brgyan //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen bo'i mchog / sna tshogs rdo rje phyag rgya drug / zla phyed mgo phreng dag gis brgyan //
translated: The six-armed Vajravarāhī, adorned with a half-moon and a garland of heads,

original: sgeg sogs nyams kyi ro ldan pa //
analyzed: sgeg sogs nyams kyi ro ldan pa //
translated: Possessing the flavor of the moods of flirtatiousness and so forth,🔽Wearing a tiger-skin skirt and silk scarves,

original: stag lpags dar gyi cod ban dang // yid bzhin nor bu spyi bor 'dzin //
analyzed: stag lpags dar gyi cod ban dang // yid bzhin nor bu spyi bor 'dzin //
translated: And holding a wish-fulfilling gem on her head,

original: rdo rje phag mo sku la 'khril //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo sku la 'khril //
translated: Embraces the body of Vajravārāhī.

original: dz'i ba sindhu ra mdog mtshungs //
analyzed: dz'i ba sindhu ra mdog mtshungs //
translated: She is the same color as Jāvinī Sindūra,

original: thod pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub can //
analyzed: thod pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub can //
translated: Holding a skull cup, vajra, and threatening gesture,

original: gcer bu bcu drug na tshod ldan //🔽rus pa'i 'khor lo mgo phreng dang // cod pan du ma'i rgyan gyis sbras //
analyzed: gcer bu bcu drug na tshod ldan // rus pa'i 'khor lo mgo phreng dang // cod pan du ma'i rgyan gyis sbras //
translated: Naked, and sixteen years old.🔽She is adorned with bone ornaments, a garland of heads,

original: skra grol ma ni spyan gsum pa //
analyzed: skra grol ma ni spyan gsum pa //
translated: And many crowns, with loose hair and three eyes.

original: bde chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: bde chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid do //
translated: She is the embodiment of great bliss and compassion.

original: chu skyes shar gyi 'dab mal //
analyzed: chu skyes shar gyi 'dab mal //
translated: In the east petal of the lotus,

original: he ru ka ni sku mdog dkar //🔽mkha' 'gro ma dang gnyis med 'khril //
analyzed: he ru ka ni sku mdog dkar // mkha' 'gro ma dang gnyis med 'khril //
translated: The white Heruka,🔽Is in union with the Ḍākinī,

original: 'khor lo dril bu legs bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo dril bu legs bsnams pa'o //
translated: Holding a wheel and a bell.

original: he ru ka ni sku mdog ljang //
analyzed: he ru ka ni sku mdog ljang //
translated: The green Heruka,

original: l'a ma dang ni gnyis su med //
analyzed: l'a ma dang ni gnyis su med //
translated: and Lāmā, nondual.

original: byang phyogs padma'i 'dab la gnas //
analyzed: byang phyogs padma'i 'dab la gnas //
translated: In the north, on a lotus petal,

original: rgya gram dril bu bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: rgya gram dril bu bsnams pa'o //
translated: holds a wheel and a bell.

original: nub phyogs padma'i gdan stengs su //
analyzed: nub phyogs padma'i gdan stengs su //
translated: In the west, on a lotus seat,

original: he ru ka dpal r'a ga'i mdog / dum skyes ma dang gnyis med pa //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal r'a ga'i mdog / dum skyes ma dang gnyis med pa //
translated: is Śrī Heruka, the color of passion, nondual with Khaṇḍarohā,

original: padma dril bu 'dzin ba'o //
analyzed: padma dril bu 'dzin ba'o //
translated: holding a lotus and a bell.

original: lho phyogs padma'i phyogs la yang //
analyzed: lho phyogs padma'i phyogs la yang //
translated: In the south, on a lotus petal,

original: he ru ka dpal gser mdog can //🔽gzugs can ma yis sku la 'khyud //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal gser mdog can // gzugs can ma yis sku la 'khyud //
translated: is Śrī Heruka, the color of gold,🔽embraced by Rūpiṇī,

original: rin chen pad snod bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: rin chen pad snod bsnams pa'o //
translated: holding a jewel and a lotus.

original: de dag kun kyang zhal gcig ma //
analyzed: de dag kun kyang zhal gcig ma //
translated: All of them have one face,

original: phyag gnyis pa la spyan gsum pa //
analyzed: phyag gnyis pa la spyan gsum pa //
translated: two arms, and three eyes,

original: dar gyi cod pan can 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan zhabs kyis mnan ba phyag rgya drug gis spras pa bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: dar gyi cod pan can 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan zhabs kyis mnan ba phyag rgya drug gis spras pa bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: with a crown of hair and a topknot, and are adorned with the six symbolic ornaments. They are the nature of great bliss, standing with the right leg straight and the left knee touching the ground, trampling on Bhairava and Kālarātri.

original: mtshams kyi padma'i 'dab ma la byang chub kyi sems kyi snod ka p'a la bdud rtsis bkang ba bzhi'o //
analyzed: mtshams kyi padma'i 'dab ma la byang chub kyi sems kyi snod ka p'a la bdud rtsis bkang ba bzhi'o //
translated: On the lotus petals in the intermediate directions are four skull cups filled with elixir, the vessels for bodhicitta.

original: rang byin brlab pa'i rim pa ste //
analyzed: rang byin brlab pa'i rim pa ste //
translated: This is the stage of self-consecration.

original: lus kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa //
analyzed: lus kyi dkyil 'khor mchog gyur pa //
translated: The supreme body maṇḍala

original: gnas kyi rim pa rab sbyor bas //
analyzed: gnas kyi rim pa rab sbyor bas //
translated: is the arrangement of the stages of the places.

original: lhan skyes ye shes bdag nyid do //
analyzed: lhan skyes ye shes bdag nyid do //
translated: It is the nature of the coemergent gnosis.🔽The sheath, the triple hollow, the navel, and the heart are, respectively,

original: sbubs ka sum mdo lte snying ga / rlung me chu sa rim pa bzhin //
analyzed: sbubs ka sum mdo lte snying ga / rlung me chu sa rim pa bzhin //
translated: wind, fire, water, and earth.

original: sgal tshigs ri rab lhun po ste //🔽chu shing me tog lta bu yi //
analyzed: sgal tshigs ri rab lhun po ste // chu shing me tog lta bu yi //
translated: The spine is Meru, Sumeru.🔽The heart lotus has eight petals,

original: snying ga'i padma 'dab brgyad pa //
analyzed: snying ga'i padma 'dab brgyad pa //
translated: like a plantain flower,

original: ge sar lte bar bcas pa ste //🔽zla nyi thabs dang @80a * //
analyzed: ge sar lte bar bcas pa ste // zla nyi thabs dang @80a * //
translated: with stamens and a center.

original: shes rab bcas //
analyzed: shes rab bcas //
translated: The moon and sun are method and wisdom.

original: lugs dang lugs min sa bon dbus //
analyzed: lugs dang lugs min sa bon dbus //
translated: The seed in the center is the proper and improper.

original: bcom ldan khrag 'thung 'das dpa' bo //
analyzed: bcom ldan khrag 'thung 'das dpa' bo //
translated: The transcendent Bhagavān is the hero.

original: zhal bzhi pa la phyag bcu gnyis //
analyzed: zhal bzhi pa la phyag bcu gnyis //
translated: He has four faces and twelve arms.

original: gsum gsum spyan mnga' 'gyur ba'i zhal //
analyzed: gsum gsum spyan mnga' 'gyur ba'i zhal //
translated: He has three eyes in each face, which are wrathful.

original: nam mkha' mdog mtshungs 'od 'phro ba //
analyzed: nam mkha' mdog mtshungs 'od 'phro ba //
translated: He is the color of space, radiating light.

original: dus mtshan dmar ba g-yas brkyang dang // g-yon zhabs 'jigs byed nag po mnan //
analyzed: dus mtshan dmar ba g-yas brkyang dang // g-yon zhabs 'jigs byed nag po mnan //
translated: His right leg is extended, and his left presses on black Bhairava.

original: rtsa ba'i zhal ni sku dang mthun //
analyzed: rtsa ba'i zhal ni sku dang mthun //
translated: The principal face is the same as the body.

original: g-yas pa gser gyi 'od dang mtshungs //
analyzed: g-yas pa gser gyi 'od dang mtshungs //
translated: The right face is the color of golden light.

original: rgyab ni padma r'a ga'i mdog / aindra n'i la zhal g-yon no //
analyzed: rgyab ni padma r'a ga'i mdog / aindra n'i la zhal g-yon no //
translated: The back is the color of a ruby, and the left face is sapphire.

original: rdo rje dril bu dang po ste //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu dang po ste //
translated: The first pair of hands hold a vajra and a bell,

original: gnyis pa glang po'i pags pa bsnams //
analyzed: gnyis pa glang po'i pags pa bsnams //
translated: and the second pair holds an elephant skin.

original: da ma ru dang dgra sta dang // gri gug mdung rtse gsum pa ni //
analyzed: da ma ru dang dgra sta dang // gri gug mdung rtse gsum pa ni //
translated: A ḍamaru, a battle-ax, a flaying knife, and a trident

original: g-yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyag na bsnams pa'o //
translated: are held in the right hands.

original: kha tv'am ga dang thod khrag dang // rdo rje'i zhags pa tshangs pa'i skud //
analyzed: kha tv'am ga dang thod khrag dang // rdo rje'i zhags pa tshangs pa'i skud //
translated: A khaṭvāṅga, a skull cup filled with blood, a vajra noose, and a Brahman thread🔽are held in the left hands.

original: thor tshugs dar gyi cod pan can //
analyzed: thor tshugs dar gyi cod pan can //
translated: He has matted hair with a topknot and a silk crown.

original: zla phyed sna tshogs rdo rje dang // yid bzhin nor bu dbu la 'jog / rus pa'i 'khor los spyi bor mtshan //
analyzed: zla phyed sna tshogs rdo rje dang // yid bzhin nor bu dbu la 'jog / rus pa'i 'khor los spyi bor mtshan //
translated: A half-moon, a crossed vajra, and a wish-fulfilling gem are placed on his head, and the top of his head is marked with a bone wheel.

original: yang dag 'khyud pa'i phag mo yang //
analyzed: yang dag 'khyud pa'i phag mo yang //
translated: Vārāhī, who embraces him perfectly,

original: bde ster rang bzhin sku mdog dmar //
analyzed: bde ster rang bzhin sku mdog dmar //
translated: is the nature of bliss and is red in color.

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis gcer bu'i tshul //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis gcer bu'i tshul //
translated: She has one face and two arms and is naked.

original: byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam bar 'khyud //
analyzed: byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam bar 'khyud //
translated: She embraces him with her two thighs.

original: rdo rje thod pa bsnams pa ste //
analyzed: rdo rje thod pa bsnams pa ste //
translated: She holds a vajra and a skull cup filled with blood.

original: sdang phyogs la sdigs skra grol ma //
analyzed: sdang phyogs la sdigs skra grol ma //
translated: Her hair is loose and she frightens those who are hostile.

original: phyag rgya lngas spras yab la dgyes //
analyzed: phyag rgya lngas spras yab la dgyes //
translated: She is adorned with the five symbolic ornaments and is delighted with him.

original: bde chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: bde chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid do //
translated: the nature of great bliss and compassion.

original: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma la /
analyzed: shar dang byang dang nub dang lho'i phyogs kyi 'dab ma la /
translated: On the petals in the east, north, west, and south,

original: mkha' 'gro ma dang / l'a ma dang / dum skyes ma dang / gzugs can ma rnams ni /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma dang / l'a ma dang / dum skyes ma dang / gzugs can ma rnams ni /
translated: are dakini, Lāmā, Khaṇḍarohā, and Rūpiṇī,

original: mthing ga dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po dang ser mo'i mdog rim pa bzhin du zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi ma spyan gsum ma g-yas gnyis na da ma ru dang gri gug / g-yon gnyis na kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa skra grol ba /
analyzed: mthing ga dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po dang ser mo'i mdog rim pa bzhin du zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi ma spyan gsum ma g-yas gnyis na da ma ru dang gri gug / g-yon gnyis na kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa skra grol ba /
translated: respectively blue, green, red, and yellow, with one face, four arms, and three eyes, holding a ḍamaru and flaying knife with the two right hands and a khaṭvāṅga and skull cup with the two left hands, with loose hair,

original: gcer bu dum bu'i ske rags kyis brgyan pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gcer bu dum bu'i ske rags kyis brgyan pa phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o //
translated: naked, adorned with a belt of heads, and possessing the five symbolic ornaments.

original: de dag gi mtshams rnams su byang chub sems kyis rab tu gang ba'i snod bzhi bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: de dag gi mtshams rnams su byang chub sems kyis rab tu gang ba'i snod bzhi bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: In the intermediate directions are four vases filled with bodhicitta and the nature of nectar.

original: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas rab tu bshad bya ba //
translated: Then, the following is to be explained:

original: bu dz'a ao aa go r'a de m'a //
analyzed: bu dz'a ao aa go r'a de m'a //
translated: Bujhauo, ao, go, rā, de, mā,

original: k'a ao tri ko ka la k'a hi //
analyzed: k'a ao tri ko ka la k'a hi //
translated: kā, o, tri, ko, ka, la, kī,

original: pre gri soo su na si ma ku //
analyzed: pre gri soo su na si ma ku //
translated: pre, grī, so, su, na, si, ma, ku.

original: thugs kyi 'khor lo mdog mthing nag / rdo rje'i phreng bas yongs bskor ba //
analyzed: thugs kyi 'khor lo mdog mthing nag / rdo rje'i phreng bas yongs bskor ba //
translated: The wheel of mind is dark blue in color, completely surrounded by a garland of vajras.

original: pulli @80b ra ma la ya mgor //🔽thod pa'i dum bu rab gtum mo //🔽dz'a la ndha ra spyi gtsug tu //
analyzed: pulli @80b ra ma la ya mgor // thod pa'i dum bu rab gtum mo // dz'a la ndha ra spyi gtsug tu //
translated: Kapāla is on the head of Pulliramalaya.

original: keng rus chen po gtum mig ma //
analyzed: keng rus chen po gtum mig ma //
translated: Mahākaṅkāla is on the crown of Jālandhara.

original: aoddin rna ba g-yas par yang //🔽keng rus can dang 'od ldan ma //
analyzed: aoddin rna ba g-yas par yang // keng rus can dang 'od ldan ma //
translated: Mahākaṅkāla is on the right ear of Oḍḍiyāna.

original: aarbu da ni ltag khung du //🔽mche gtsigs sna chen dpa' mo'o //🔽go d'a pa r'i rna ba g-yon //
analyzed: aarbu da ni ltag khung du // mche gtsigs sna chen dpa' mo'o // go d'a pa r'i rna ba g-yon //
translated: Kaṅkāla is on the nape of Arbuda.

original: lha dgra dpa' bo'i blo can ma //
analyzed: lha dgra dpa' bo'i blo can ma //
translated: Daṃṣṭriṇī is on the left ear of Godāvarī.

original: r'a me shva r'i smin ma'i dbus //🔽'od dpag med dang mi'u thung ma //
analyzed: r'a me shva r'i smin ma'i dbus // 'od dpag med dang mi'u thung ma //
translated: Śūradhī is on the forehead of Rāmeśvara.

original: de bi ko ta mig tu ni //🔽rdo rje 'od dang lang dbang phyug / m'a la ba ni phrag par yang //
analyzed: de bi ko ta mig tu ni // rdo rje 'od dang lang dbang phyug / m'a la ba ni phrag par yang //
translated: Amitābha is in the eye of Devīkoṭa.🔽Vajraprabha is on the shoulder of Malava.

original: rdo rje'i sku dang shing grib ste //🔽thugs kyi rigs las des 'byung ba'i //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku dang shing grib ste // thugs kyi rigs las des 'byung ba'i //
translated: Vajrakāya is on the shoulder of Mālava.

original: 'di dag ni da ;
analyzed: 'di dag ni da ;
translated: These are the ones that arise from the mind family.

original: nam mkha' la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la spyod pa'o //
translated: They are the sky-goers.

original: gsung gi 'khor lo dmar ba'i mdog / padma'i phreng bas yongs bskor ba //
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo dmar ba'i mdog / padma'i phreng bas yongs bskor ba //
translated: The wheel of speech is red, surrounded by a garland of lotuses.

original: k'a ma r'u ba mchan khung du //
analyzed: k'a ma r'u ba mchan khung du //
translated: Kāmarūpa is in the armpit,

original: myu gu can dang sa srung ma //🔽ao tre nu mar rdo rje'o //
analyzed: myu gu can dang sa srung ma // ao tre nu mar rdo rje'o //
translated: with Upakeśin and Dhātṛ.

original: ral pa can dang 'jigs byed ma'o //
analyzed: ral pa can dang 'jigs byed ma'o //
translated: Oḍra is in the breast, with Vajra and Bhairava.

original: tri sha ku ni lte bar ni //
analyzed: tri sha ku ni lte bar ni //
translated: Triśakuni is at the navel,

original: dpa' chen rlung gi shugs can ma //
analyzed: dpa' chen rlung gi shugs can ma //
translated: with Mahāvīra and Marutvatī.

original: ko sa la ni sna rtser yang //
analyzed: ko sa la ni sna rtser yang //
translated: Kosala is at the tip of the nose,

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad chang 'thung ma //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad chang 'thung ma //
translated: with Vajrahūṃkāra and Surābhakṣī.

original: ka ling ga khar rab bzang dang // lha mo sngo bsangs legs gnas la //
analyzed: ka ling ga khar rab bzang dang // lha mo sngo bsangs legs gnas la //
translated: Kaliṅga is at the mouth, with Subhadra and Śyāmādevī.

original: lam pa ka ni mgrin par yang //
analyzed: lam pa ka ni mgrin par yang //
translated: Lampāka is at the throat,

original: rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang ma //🔽k'a nytsi snying gar dpa' bo ni //
analyzed: rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang ma // k'a nytsi snying gar dpa' bo ni //
translated: with Vajrabhadra and Subhadrā.

original: 'jigs byed che dang rta rna ma //
analyzed: 'jigs byed che dang rta rna ma //
translated: Kāñcī is at the heart, with Vīra and Mahābhairava.

original: hi m'a la ya mdoms su ni //
analyzed: hi m'a la ya mdoms su ni //
translated: Hīmavat is at the genitals,

original: mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma //🔽gsung gi rigs las nges 'byung ba'i //
analyzed: mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma // gsung gi rigs las nges 'byung ba'i //
translated: with Virūpākṣa and Hayakarṇī.🔽These are the ones who move on the earth,

original: 'di dag ni sa la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni sa la spyod pa'o //
translated: arising from the family of speech.

original: sku yi 'khor lo mdog dkar zhing //
analyzed: sku yi 'khor lo mdog dkar zhing //
translated: The wheel of body is white,

original: 'khor lo'i phreng bas yongs bskor ba //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i phreng bas yongs bskor ba //
translated: Surrounded by a garland of wheels.

original: pre ta p'u ri mtshan ma la //
analyzed: pre ta p'u ri mtshan ma la //
translated: On the sign of the Pretapuri

original: stobs po che dang 'khor shugs can //
analyzed: stobs po che dang 'khor shugs can //
translated: is Mahābala and Cakravegā.

original: gri ha de ba bshad lam du //
analyzed: gri ha de ba bshad lam du //
translated: On the path of explanation of the Gṛhadevatā

original: rin chen rdo rje dum skyes ma //
analyzed: rin chen rdo rje dum skyes ma //
translated: is Ratnasaṃbhava and Khaṇḍarohā.

original: soo r'ashta brla gnyis su //
analyzed: soo r'ashta brla gnyis su //
translated: On the two thighs of the Sauvīra

original: rta mgrin chang 'tshong dpa' mo'o //🔽su wardvi ba byin par yang //
analyzed: rta mgrin chang 'tshong dpa' mo'o // su wardvi ba byin par yang //
translated: is Hayagrīva and Surābhakṣī.🔽On the hips of the Suvarṇadvīpa

original: nam mkha'i snying dang go cha ma //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying dang go cha ma //
translated: is Ākāśagarbha and Vajravarāhī.

original: n'a ga ra ni lag sor la //
analyzed: n'a ga ra ni lag sor la //
translated: On the fingers of the Nāgarā

original: he ru ka dang rab dpa' mo //
analyzed: he ru ka dang rab dpa' mo //
translated: is Heruka and Pravodhā.

original: sindhu rkang pa'i bol du yang //
analyzed: sindhu rkang pa'i bol du yang //
translated: On the ankles of the Sindhu

original: padma gar dbang stobs chen ma //
analyzed: padma gar dbang stobs chen ma //
translated: is Padmanarteśvara and Mahābalā.🔽On the toes of the Maru

original: ma ru mthe bor rnam snang dang // dpa' mo 'khor los sgyur mo'o //
analyzed: ma ru mthe bor rnam snang dang // dpa' mo 'khor los sgyur mo'o //
translated: is Vairocana and Cakravartinī.

original: ku lu t'a ni pus mor yang //
analyzed: ku lu t'a ni pus mor yang //
translated: On the knees of the Kulutā

original: rdor sems brtson 'grus chen mo'o //🔽sku yi rigs las nges byung ba'i //
analyzed: rdor sems brtson 'grus chen mo'o // sku yi rigs las nges byung ba'i //
translated: is Vajrasattva and Mahāvīryā.

original: 'di dag ni sa 'og la spyod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni sa 'og la spyod pa'o //
translated: These are the ones who move about below the earth.

original: dpa' bo de dag thams cad ni zhal gcig pa /
analyzed: dpa' bo de dag thams cad ni zhal gcig pa /
translated: All of those heroes have one face,

original: @81a * // phyag bzhi pa /
analyzed: @81a * // phyag bzhi pa /
translated: four arms,

original: spyan gsum pa /
analyzed: spyan gsum pa /
translated: and three eyes.

original: 'khor lo so so'i kha dog dang mthun pa /
analyzed: 'khor lo so so'i kha dog dang mthun pa /
translated: The colors of the wheels correspond to the colors of the individual deities.

original: g-yas dang po ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo ste /
analyzed: g-yas dang po ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo ste /
translated: The first right hand holds a vajra, lotus, and wheel, respectively.

original: g-yon dang pos dril bu 'dzin zhing yum gyi sku la 'khyud pa /
analyzed: g-yon dang pos dril bu 'dzin zhing yum gyi sku la 'khyud pa /
translated: The first left hand holds a bell and embraces the body of the mother.

original: 'og ma gnyis kyis da ma ru dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa phyag rgyas rab tu brgyan pa ral pa'i cod pan no //
analyzed: 'og ma gnyis kyis da ma ru dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa phyag rgyas rab tu brgyan pa ral pa'i cod pan no //
translated: The lower two hands hold a ḍamaru and khaṭvāṅga.

original: dpa' mo rnams ni zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis kyis yab la 'khyud pas rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams te kun gyi dpral bar rdo rje'i phreng bas mtshan pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' mo rnams ni zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis kyis yab la 'khyud pas rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams te kun gyi dpral bar rdo rje'i phreng bas mtshan pa'o //
translated: The heroines have one face and two hands, which embrace the father. They hold a vajra and skull cup and are all marked with a vajra garland on the forehead.

original: lce yi lkog tu khva gdong ma //🔽sna yi rtser ni 'ug gdong ma //
analyzed: lce yi lkog tu khva gdong ma // sna yi rtser ni 'ug gdong ma //
translated: At the back of the throat is Kākāsyā.🔽At the tip of the nose is Ulūkāsyā.

original: mtshan ma'i rtser yang khyi gdong ma //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i rtser yang khyi gdong ma //
translated: At the tip of the organ is Śvāṇāsyā.

original: bshad ba'i lam du phag gdong ma'o //🔽gshin rje sreg ma rna ba g-yas //
analyzed: bshad ba'i lam du phag gdong ma'o // gshin rje sreg ma rna ba g-yas //
translated: At the path of excretion is Śūkarāsyā.🔽Yamadaṃṣṭrī is in the right ear.

original: g-yon par gshin rje pho nya ma'o //
analyzed: g-yon par gshin rje pho nya ma'o //
translated: Yamadūti is in the left ear.

original: mche ba can ma mig g-yas te //
analyzed: mche ba can ma mig g-yas te //
translated: Vikaṭā is in the right eye.

original: mig g-yon gshin rje 'joms ma'o //
analyzed: mig g-yon gshin rje 'joms ma'o //
translated: On the left is Yamini.

original: lha mo de dag thams cad kyang //
analyzed: lha mo de dag thams cad kyang //
translated: All these goddesses

original: zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum ma //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum ma //
translated: have one face, four arms, and three eyes.

original: gcer bu phyogs na gnas pa rnams mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dang mtshungs te /
analyzed: gcer bu phyogs na gnas pa rnams mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dang mtshungs te /
translated: They are naked, dwell in the directions, and are similar to the dakinis and so forth.

original: mtshams rnams su mi phyed dbang phyug gi gzugs can yid 'phrog ma cha gnyis 'dzin pa /
analyzed: mtshams rnams su mi phyed dbang phyug gi gzugs can yid 'phrog ma cha gnyis 'dzin pa /
translated: In the intermediate directions are two Manonmanis, holding two halves of a magic wand.

original: phyag rgya lnga dang dum bu'i ske rags kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o //🔽gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang yang //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga dang dum bu'i ske rags kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o // gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang yang //
translated: They are adorned with the five symbolic ornaments and a garland of human heads.🔽The places and the neighboring places,

original: zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni //
analyzed: zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni //
translated: the fields and the neighboring fields,

original: tshando nye ba'i tshando ste //
analyzed: tshando nye ba'i tshando ste //
translated: the Chas and the neighboring Chas,

original: 'du ba nye ba'i 'du ba dang // dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod de //
analyzed: 'du ba nye ba'i 'du ba dang // dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod de //
translated: the assemblies and the neighboring assemblies, and the charnel grounds and the neighboring charnel grounds

original: sa bcu rnam par dag pa yi //
analyzed: sa bcu rnam par dag pa yi //
translated: are the pure ten levels.

original: sum cu rtsa bdun tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bdun tshul gyis ni //
translated: The thirty-seven are

original: byang chub phyogs la gnas pa yang //
analyzed: byang chub phyogs la gnas pa yang //
translated: the factors of enlightenment.

original: rnam par mi rtog sems bdag nyid //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog sems bdag nyid //
translated: The nonconceptual mind

original: bde stong ro gcig gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bde stong ro gcig gyur pa'o //
translated: is the single taste of bliss and emptiness.

original: phung po khams dang skye mched rnams //
analyzed: phung po khams dang skye mched rnams //
translated: The aggregates, constituents, and sense spheres🔽are the pure five transcendent perfections.

original: lha yi rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: lha yi rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Are the pure forms of the deities.

original: de nas go cha gnyis bshad de //
analyzed: de nas go cha gnyis bshad de //
translated: Then the two armors are explained,

original: gnas kyi rim pa sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: gnas kyi rim pa sbyor ba yis //
translated: In the sequence of the places.🔽Vajrasattva, Vairocana,

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam snang dang // nyi ma padma gar dbang phyug / rta mchog he ru ka bdag nyid //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam snang dang // nyi ma padma gar dbang phyug / rta mchog he ru ka bdag nyid //
translated: Sūrya, Padma, and Śiva,

original: sngags kyi rnam pa lha yi gzugs //
analyzed: sngags kyi rnam pa lha yi gzugs //
translated: The form of the mantra is the form of the deity.

original: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje ma //🔽rmongs byed ma dang skrag byed ma //
analyzed: rdo rje phag mo gshin rje ma // rmongs byed ma dang skrag byed ma //
translated: Vajravārāhī, Yamī,🔽Mohinī, and Bhīma,

original: bskyod byed ma dang gtum mo ste //
analyzed: bskyod byed ma dang gtum mo ste //
translated: Cāriṇī, and Caṇḍālī,

original: mkhas pas legs par dgod par bya //
analyzed: mkhas pas legs par dgod par bya //
translated: The wise one should properly arrange.

original: rang sngags las byung 'od zer spros //
analyzed: rang sngags las byung 'od zer spros //
translated: Radiate light rays from one's own mantra.

original: sngags dang phyag rgya'i @81b sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya'i @81b sbyor ba yis //
translated: With the union of mantra and mudra,

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs //
translated: The assembly of buddhas and bodhisattvas

original: phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings las 'gugs //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings las 'gugs //
translated: Are invoked from the dharmadhātu of the ten directions.

original: aom yo ga shuddha sarba dharma: yo ga shuddho& ham /
analyzed: aom yo ga shuddha sarba dharma: yo ga shuddho& ham /
translated: Oṃ yoga śuddhaḥ sarva dharmāḥ, yoga śuddho 'haṃ.

original: de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo de mthong nas /🔽ao sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa /
analyzed: de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo de mthong nas / ao sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shinytsa /
translated: Then, having seen that wheel of awareness,

original: tu m'am zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: tu m'am zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: One should say, Oṃ sarva tathāgata abhiṣekatu mam.

original: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis rin po che'i bum pa bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyi char 'bebs shing /
analyzed: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis rin po che'i bum pa bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyi char 'bebs shing /
translated: The goddesses such as Locanā and so forth rain down a stream of elixir from jeweled vases.

original: aom sarba ta tha' ga ta aa bhi shinytsa sa ma ya shr'i ye h'um /
analyzed: aom sarba ta tha' ga ta aa bhi shinytsa sa ma ya shr'i ye h'um /
translated: oṃ sarva tathāgata abhiṣiñca śrīye hūṃ

original: de dag rjes su chags pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i byang sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur zhing bde ba chen po'i ngo bor gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de dag rjes su chags pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i byang sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur zhing bde ba chen po'i ngo bor gyur pa'o //
translated: They confer empowerment with a stream of bodhicitta arisen from their passionate union, and they become the essence of great bliss.

original: rnal 'byor kun gyi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor kun gyi sbyor ba yis //
translated: Through the yoga of all yogas,

original: ro gcig gyur par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ro gcig gyur par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on the state of one taste.

original: thugs gsung sku yi ye shes che //
analyzed: thugs gsung sku yi ye shes che //
translated: The great gnosis of mind, speech, and body

original: srog dang rtsol ba yang dag spro //
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba yang dag spro //
translated: is the perfect emanation of prāṇa and āyāma.

original: h'um a'a: aom bam /
analyzed: h'um a'a: aom bam /
translated: hūṃ āḥ oṃ vaṃ

original: rim pa bzhin gsal bar byas nas /
analyzed: rim pa bzhin gsal bar byas nas /
translated: Having visualized them in order,

original: spro dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid du gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: spro dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid du gnas par bya ste /
translated: one should abide in the nature of emanation and gathering.

original: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
translated: oṃ śrī vajra he he ru ru ka ha ha huṃ huṃ phaṭ

original: d'a ki n'i dzva la sa mba ram sv'a h'a /
analyzed: d'a ki n'i dzva la sa mba ram sv'a h'a /
translated: dākinī jvalasambaram svāhā

original: aom hri ha ha h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom hri ha ha h'um h'um phat /
translated: oṃ hrīḥ ha ha huṃ huṃ phaṭ

original: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye /
analyzed: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye /
translated: oṃ sarva buddha dākinīye

original: badzra warnna n'i ye h'um h'um phat /🔽aom badzra bee ro tse n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: badzra warnna n'i ye h'um h'um phat / aom badzra bee ro tse n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Vajravarnaniye hum hum phat.🔽Om vajravarnaniye hum hum phat svaha.

original: aom shr'i buddha he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom shr'i buddha he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
translated: Om shri buddha he he ru ru kama hum hum phat.

original: d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /
analyzed: d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /
translated: Dakini jvala sampra swah.

original: aom sr'i karma he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom sr'i karma he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
translated: Om shri karma he he ru ru kama hum hum phat.

original: d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra sv'ah'a /
analyzed: d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra sv'ah'a /
translated: Dakini jvala sampra swah.

original: aom shr'i padma he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom shr'i padma he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
translated: Om shri padma he he ru ru kama hum hum phat.

original: d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /
analyzed: d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /
translated: Dakini jvala sampra swah.

original: aom shr'i ratna he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom shr'i ratna he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
translated: Om shri ratna he he ru ru kama hum hum phat.

original: d'a ki h'i dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a /🔽aom d'a ki n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: d'a ki h'i dz'a la samba ra sv'a h'a / aom d'a ki n'i ye h'um h'um phat /
translated: Dakini jvala sampra swah.🔽Om dakiniye hum hum phat.

original: aom y'a me h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom y'a me h'um h'um phat /
translated: Om yamaye hum hum phat.

original: aom khanda ro ha h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom khanda ro ha h'um h'um phat /
translated: Om khandaroha hum hum phat.

original: aom r'u pi n'i ye h'um h'um phat /🔽aom na mo bha ga wa te w'i re sh'a ma h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom r'u pi n'i ye h'um h'um phat / aom na mo bha ga wa te w'i re sh'a ma h'um h'um phat /
translated: Om rupiniye hum hum phat.🔽Om namo bhagavate vare shmashana mahasan nivasini hum hum phat.

original: aom ma h'a kalp'agni sanni bh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom ma h'a kalp'agni sanni bh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
translated: Om mahakalpagan sannibhaye hum hum phat.

original: aom dza t'a ma ku totka t'a ya h'um h'um phat /🔽aom damshtra ka r'a lo gra bhi sha na mu kh'a ya h'um h'um phat /🔽aom sa h'a sra pra bh'u dz'a bh'a su r'a ya h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom dza t'a ma ku totka t'a ya h'um h'um phat / aom damshtra ka r'a lo gra bhi sha na mu kh'a ya h'um h'um phat / aom sa h'a sra pra bh'u dz'a bh'a su r'a ya h'um h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ, to the one with a topknot and a crown, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ, to the one with a face terrifying with bared fangs, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.🔽Oṃ, to the one with the light of powerful arms, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom pa ra shu p'a sho dyam ta sh'u la kha tvam ga dha ri ni h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom pa ra shu p'a sho dyam ta sh'u la kha tvam ga dha ri ni h'um h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ, to the one holding a flaying knife and skull cup, with a garland of heads, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom ma h'a dhu mth'a nt'a k'a ra wa pu sh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
analyzed: aom ma h'a dhu mth'a nt'a k'a ra wa pu sh'a ya h'um h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ, to the one with a great smoke-colored garment, hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mo las 'phros pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo dpag tu med pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te /
analyzed: ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse mo las 'phros pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo dpag tu med pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te /
translated: The infinite sambhogacakra emanated from the tips of the pores of the body illuminate all world systems and turn the wheel of dharma.

original: slar tshur 'dus pas ro gcig zag pa med pa'i ye shes su thim pa'o //
analyzed: slar tshur 'dus pas ro gcig zag pa med pa'i ye shes su thim pa'o //
translated: They return and dissolve into the single taste of undefiled wisdom.

original: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis //
analyzed: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis //
translated: The twenty-four heroes

original: @82a * // lus kyi khams la rnam par brtag /'gro ba rigs drug la bsgral nas //
analyzed: @82a * // lus kyi khams la rnam par brtag /'gro ba rigs drug la bsgral nas //
translated: are imagined in the body element, liberating the six classes of migrating beings.

original: bla na med pa'i gnas su gzhag / sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i gnas su gzhag / sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las //
translated: From the nature of body, speech, and mind,

original: yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid kyis //
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyi bdag nyid kyis //
translated: With the nature of the three syllables,

original: mtho ris mi lus sa 'og tu //
analyzed: mtho ris mi lus sa 'og tu //
translated: In the higher realms, human bodies, and the underworld,

original: lus can de ni sku gcig 'gyur //
analyzed: lus can de ni sku gcig 'gyur //
translated: That embodied one becomes a single body.

original: mnyam nyid gnas pa'i sems kyis ni //
analyzed: mnyam nyid gnas pa'i sems kyis ni //
translated: With a mind abiding in equality,

original: rnal 'byor dbang phyug ldang ba na //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang phyug ldang ba na //
translated: When the lord of yogins arises,🔽The supreme bliss of the ḍākinīs,

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba'i mchog / klus bskul ba ni dran par bya //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba'i mchog / klus bskul ba ni dran par bya //
translated: The urging of the nāgas, should be remembered.🔽First, worshiping the guru,

original: thog mar bla ma mchod pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin las //
analyzed: thog mar bla ma mchod pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin las //
translated: From the nature of Vajrasattva,

original: dbang bskur rol ba'i bde chen po //
analyzed: dbang bskur rol ba'i bde chen po //
translated: The consecration, the great bliss of play,

original: skad cig gis ni kun khyab pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig gis ni kun khyab pa'o //
translated: Pervades everything in an instant.

original: sku gsung thugs la gnas par bya //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs la gnas par bya //
translated: Abide in body, speech, and mind.

original: mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: With the yoga of non-equipoise,

original: snying rje chen po'i yid kyis ni //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i yid kyis ni //
translated: With a mind of great compassion,

original: khams gsum pa yi sems can kun //
analyzed: khams gsum pa yi sems can kun //
translated: All sentient beings of the three realms

original: shr'i he ru kar blta bya zhing //
analyzed: shr'i he ru kar blta bya zhing //
translated: Should be seen as Śrī Heruka.

original: byang sems chu rgyun khrus bya ste //
analyzed: byang sems chu rgyun khrus bya ste //
translated: Wash with the stream of bodhicitta

original: bcu phyed bdud rtsi'i zas las bza' //
analyzed: bcu phyed bdud rtsi'i zas las bza' //
translated: And eat the food of the nectar of the waxing moon.

original: gcer bu skra grol lhor bltas la //
analyzed: gcer bu skra grol lhor bltas la //
translated: Naked, with loose hair, facing south,

original: brtul zhugs can gyis gtor ma sbyin //
analyzed: brtul zhugs can gyis gtor ma sbyin //
translated: the one who is disciplined should give the sacrificial cake.

original: gsang ba'i rim par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i rim par bstan pa'o //
translated: This is the teaching of the secret stage.

original: spros pa kun la dmigs nas ni //🔽spros pas spros pa med par bya //
analyzed: spros pa kun la dmigs nas ni // spros pas spros pa med par bya //
translated: Having observed all elaborations,🔽elaborations are made free of elaborations.

original: spros pa nyid ni spros med byed //
analyzed: spros pa nyid ni spros med byed //
translated: Elaborations themselves are made free of elaborations.

original: spros bral bde ba chen po ste //
analyzed: spros bral bde ba chen po ste //
translated: Freedom from elaborations is great bliss.

original: brtan dang g-yo ba'i 'jig rten kun //
analyzed: brtan dang g-yo ba'i 'jig rten kun //
translated: The entire world of the animate and inanimate

original: ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing //🔽de nyid myur ba nyid du yang //
analyzed: ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing // de nyid myur ba nyid du yang //
translated: is accomplished without exception.🔽That very thing is also

original: bde mchog dam pa 'grub pa yin //
analyzed: bde mchog dam pa 'grub pa yin //
translated: the supreme bliss that is quickly accomplished.

original: bcom ldan sku gsung thugs la bzhugs //
analyzed: bcom ldan sku gsung thugs la bzhugs //
translated: It abides in the Bhagavān’s body, speech, and mind.

original: a'a li k'a li mnyam gnas pa //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li mnyam gnas pa //
translated: The union of ālikāli

original: 'khor lo la ni nges par bskor //
analyzed: 'khor lo la ni nges par bskor //
translated: is definitely turned in the cakra.

original: steng du 'bar ba'i tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: steng du 'bar ba'i tshul gyis ni //
translated: Above, it is the blazing mode,

original: 'og tu 'bab pa nges pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'og tu 'bab pa nges pa'i phyir //
translated: and below, it is the falling mode.

original: zag med dri med bde ba'i dngos //
analyzed: zag med dri med bde ba'i dngos //
translated: The uncontaminated, immaculate, blissful reality

original: 'chi med thig le'i ngo bo ni //
analyzed: 'chi med thig le'i ngo bo ni //
translated: is the essence of the immortal bindu.

original: sa bon tshul gyis 'bab par 'gyur //
analyzed: sa bon tshul gyis 'bab par 'gyur //
translated: It falls in the manner of a seed.

original: rtag tu snying gi dbus gnas pa //
analyzed: rtag tu snying gi dbus gnas pa //
translated: It always abides in the center of the heart.

original: 'od gsal bde ba chen po ni //
analyzed: 'od gsal bde ba chen po ni //
translated: The great bliss of clear light

original: nyi ma zla ba rnam dag pa //
analyzed: nyi ma zla ba rnam dag pa //
translated: The pure sun and moon

original: 'char dang nub par bstan pa yin //
analyzed: 'char dang nub par bstan pa yin //
translated: are taught to rise and set.

original: sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing //
analyzed: sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing //
translated: Liberated from all evil,

original: bsod nams thams cad rnam par 'phel //
analyzed: bsod nams thams cad rnam par 'phel //
translated: all merit increases.

original: de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te //
analyzed: de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te //
translated: That itself is the wisdom of the Buddha;

original: gzhan du rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it will not be found elsewhere.

original: lus med dri ma med pa ste //
analyzed: lus med dri ma med pa ste //
translated: It is without body, without stain,

original: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rang bzhin //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rang bzhin //
translated: the nature of the saṃbhogakāya.

original: ye shes sku ni dri ma med //
analyzed: ye shes sku ni dri ma med //
translated: The wisdom body is stainless;

original: skye ba de nyid la thob 'gyur //
analyzed: skye ba de nyid la thob 'gyur //
translated: it is attained in that very lifetime.

original: @82b thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug cing //
analyzed: @82b thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug cing //
translated: The union of method and wisdom

original: gnyis thim bcu drug cha phyed can //
analyzed: gnyis thim bcu drug cha phyed can //
translated: dissolves the two, with half of the sixteenth part.

original: zag bcas bde med gnyis spangs pa //
analyzed: zag bcas bde med gnyis spangs pa //
translated: Without contaminated bliss, abandoning the two,

original: gsang ba dga' ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: gsang ba dga' ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: it is the nature of the secret joy.

original: dam tshig gsang ba chen po yi //
analyzed: dam tshig gsang ba chen po yi //
translated: The great secret of the pledge

original: sku gsung thugs la mnyam med la //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs la mnyam med la //
translated: is unequaled in body, speech, and mind.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid ngo bo stong //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid ngo bo stong //
translated: The essence of its own characteristic is empty,

original: rtog pa gnyis ni rnam bral ba'o //🔽'das pa dang ni da ltar yang //
analyzed: rtog pa gnyis ni rnam bral ba'o // 'das pa dang ni da ltar yang //
translated: free from the two kinds of conceptuality.🔽The three times—

original: ma 'ongs pa yi dus gsum po //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa yi dus gsum po //
translated: the past, the present, and the future—

original: lhan skyes ye shes mchog bde ba //
analyzed: lhan skyes ye shes mchog bde ba //
translated: The supreme bliss of innate pristine consciousness,🔽The nature of purity like stainless space,

original: dri med mkha' ltar dag pa'i bdag / gsang ba sems kyi spyod yul las //
analyzed: dri med mkha' ltar dag pa'i bdag / gsang ba sems kyi spyod yul las //
translated: From the domain of the secret mind,

original: zung du 'jug ba'i ngo bor ni //
analyzed: zung du 'jug ba'i ngo bor ni //
translated: The essence of union

original: mi rtog pa la rab gnas na ;
analyzed: mi rtog pa la rab gnas na ;
translated: Is fully present in nonconceptuality.

original: / mchog gi sku ni nges par 'thob //
analyzed: / mchog gi sku ni nges par 'thob //
translated: The supreme body is definitely attained.

original: bsgom pa 'di ni mchog yin te //
analyzed: bsgom pa 'di ni mchog yin te //
translated: This meditation is supreme,

original: 'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med //
translated: The unsurpassed spiritual power of desire.

original: rnal 'byor skye ba 'di nyid la //
analyzed: rnal 'byor skye ba 'di nyid la //
translated: In this very life, the yogi

original: rdo rje 'chang gi sa thob pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang gi sa thob pa'o //
translated: Attains the stage of Vajradhara.

original: rnal 'byor ba rnams 'pho ba'i tshe //🔽dpal ldan khrag 'thung la sogs pa //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba rnams 'pho ba'i tshe // dpal ldan khrag 'thung la sogs pa //
translated: When yogis transfer at the time of death,

original: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs rnams kyis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs rnams kyis //
translated: The assembly of yoginīs,🔽Such as glorious Heruka,

original: me tog sna tshogs lag na thogs //
analyzed: me tog sna tshogs lag na thogs //
translated: Hold various flowers in their hands.🔽With various parasols, banners, and flags,

original: rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang // glu yi mchod pa sna tshogs kyis //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang // glu yi mchod pa sna tshogs kyis //
translated: And various offerings of song,

original: 'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog ste //
analyzed: 'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog ste //
translated: This is called “death,” a concept.

original: mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed //
analyzed: mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed //
translated: They lead to the celestial realm.

original: dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gsang ba rin po che yid bzhin nor bu /
analyzed: dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gsang ba rin po che yid bzhin nor bu /
translated: The Wish-Fulfilling Jewel of the Secret Precious Wheel of Shri Cakrasaṃvara

original: dpal au rgyan gandho la'i gtsug lag khang nas /
analyzed: dpal au rgyan gandho la'i gtsug lag khang nas /
translated: From the temple of Sri Uddiyana Gandhola,

original: dri med ye shes mkha' 'gro mas rje btsun ti lo ba la gdams pa /
analyzed: dri med ye shes mkha' 'gro mas rje btsun ti lo ba la gdams pa /
translated: the instructions of the Vimalaprabha dakini to the venerable Tilopa.

original: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa'i snying po dpal n'a ro pas mdzad pa'o /
analyzed: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa'i snying po dpal n'a ro pas mdzad pa'o /
translated: The essence of the oral lineage of the Sri Cakrasamvara sadhana composed by the glorious Naropa.

original: // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta shr'i n'a ro pa chen po dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba mar ba chos kyi blo gros bdag gis zhus te bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta shr'i n'a ro pa chen po dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba mar ba chos kyi blo gros bdag gis zhus te bsgyur ba'o//
translated: The great Indian pandita Shri Naropa and the Tibetan translator Marpa Chokyi Lodro requested and translated this.
